name: Expiration Station
description:
In Expiration Station, everything is set to expire, even you!

Fight enemies to stay alive and see how much score points you can stack!

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Jump - Space
  • Dash - Shift
  • Aim - Mouse movement
  • Use primary weapon - LMB
  • Use secondary weapon - RMB

When using melee weapons (including unarmed fists) you can deflect incoming projectiles

Credits:

- Music: https://wagner-derek.itch.io/

Enjoy!
